title: I can't post in the the Invasion MegaThread
body: I haven't used the boards before so I don't know why its doing this, It says I need to be level 7 or higher to post, but I am level 30. I have tried refreshing the page and re-logging to see if that would fix it but nothing has changed. Do I need to create a support ticket or is there something else I can do?

replies.body: It looks like it was just an account syncing issue!  Glad it's fixed now. :D
So I came back from watching a youtube video and apparently posting this fixed the issue for some reason.
